IX.iii.1.l.3.
r
.
Withdrawals From Bank Accounts and CDs
Do not count withdrawals from regular bank accounts and certificates of deposit (CDs), as they do not constitute income events because the
interest is counted as it accrues, and
withdrawal is merely a conversion of assets.
Exception
:Â  If the assets are in an IRA or other retirement account, apply the provisions in
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.I.1.c
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
